name: onwf

body.origin:
|- wss(con0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
-| wceq(cdm(cr1), con0)
-| wss(cdm(cr1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)
⊣ dom(R1)= On
⊣ dom(R1)⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)

|- wss(con0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
-| wceq(cdm(cr1), con0)

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)
⊣ dom(R1)= On
⊣ dom(R1)⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(cr1), con0)
-| wfn(cr1, con0)
-| wi(wfn(cr1, con0), wceq(cdm(cr1), con0))

cumulated.origin:

⊢ On ⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)

⊣ R1[Fn]On
⊣ (R1[Fn]On → dom(R1)= On)

-| wss(cdm(cr1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(cr1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
-| diffsc(hs0, cdm(cr1))
-| diffsc(hs0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(R1)⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(R1)→ hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
⊣ d(hs0, dom(R1))
⊣ d(hs0, ⋃(R1 " On))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(con0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
-| diffsc(hs0, cdm(cr1))
-| diffsc(hs0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(R1)→ hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
⊣ d(hs0, dom(R1))
⊣ d(hs0, ⋃(R1 " On))

stmt.origin: simpld(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
stmt.pretty: simpld(hs0 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), (rank ` hs0)= hs0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈ dom(R1)→ hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(R1)→(hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧(rank ` hs0)= hs0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(con0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))

-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ ⋃(R1 " On)
⊣ d(hs0, dom(R1))
⊣ d(hs0, ⋃(R1 " On))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(R1)→(hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧(rank ` hs0)= hs0))

comment: The ordinals are all well-founded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
